PAC is Android Based Application with which users can compare the Charges of Rides and also prices of food items . It can help people to: 1.Save Time of user by showing different types of news on one platform. 2.Kill effort of using different apps for Rides and Food Ordering 3.Show user variety of restaurant for food and Different types of rides on user location
There are two modules in our system 1-PAC RIDES(for comparing Ride charges) 2-PAC EATS( for comparing food prices)
